<3 ME!! <3

ok so summer so far has been quite interesting... filled with many laughs and a few tears.. but don't need to talk about the tears :P...

Monday i went to school for my last exam and to say bbye to every one :(... then it was off to publix with kat and sofa and then we dropped sofa off at home and kat and i went to her house for a while to chill out and wound up watching Evita.... ((such dorks)) hehe but its ok... thats why i love her... i wouldn't be able to do that with anyone else haha.  anyways.. back on topic... uumm we got ready .... REALLY EARLY.... and drove around for about an hour till we wound up at anna's house.  We went from anna's house to go get nicole and jenna and then it was off to Mykonos.  It was my first time ever going there so i was sooo excited cause i heard it was sooo much funn..... and everyone was soo right... i had the time of my life event hought i was sweating like a pig.. it was gross but sooo...ooo...ooo...ooo fuuunn. tthenn after that we all went to the beach for a little bonding time before everyone went away for the summer. It was soo funn and beautiful at the beach. Yea so then all the ladies ((me, anna, ana, kat, jenna, dani, nicole)) went back to annas house for a little sleepover and storytime.  So funn i love you girls soo much i can't even tell you :)

So then Tuesday, Wed., Thursday were nothing special.  I got my nails done with steph during that little time period but thats about it... OH... and i started my first job :D:D:D:D.... it was soo much fuun. 

Friday.... oohhh friddayy... so boring... at first.... i stayed home all day pretty much except when i went to get my eyebrows done with steph.. After that i came right home and layed down for a while.. took a shower.. got ready for the "banquet." My mom got home and i argued with her for about 15 minutes about how much i didn't want to go to this banquet... i really really REALLY REALLY REALLY didn't wanna go cause everyone was inviting me to do things and i would have rather stayed home and like gone out with the girlies.... so i get to the Marriot and im walking down the hallway to go to the "Parkland Horseman's association" "BANQUET" and i hear like this rap music... like really loud and i walk past this open door and the first face i see was Anna Walsh... then i started to see Kat, Steph, AJ and everyone else and i was like...... uuummmm OK... and i walked in and everyone was like SUPRISE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!.....   They threw me a suprise sweet 16!!! I felt sooo special... I have never really felt that before and at that time i reallyh needed it... i was having so much shut going on with just everything and i needed to know that peoplke were there for me... i never would have thought!! but anyways.........AAAAAHHHH i finally got my suprise party.. ive always wanted one :)... we had an amazing time and i couldn't have asked for anything more!!... except that some people could have had the curtousy to even call to wish me a happy birthday;... but thats ok... i didn't let it ruin my night... i had soo much fun and i  am so gratefulll to have parents that would put on a party like that for me... and thanki you everyone for coming and making my sweet 16 sooo special to me i love you all.... and thank you for the gifts.. they were all very sweet.... so yea then everyone left and Kat, Anna, Me and Steph came back to my house, opened gifts and they all slept over.  I love the way anna falls alseep :P... sorry i just felt i should say that.  hehe it makes me happy. 

Ok Saturday we all woke up and went out for breakfast at Strathmore and then all went our separate ways for the day accept me and steph.  We went back to my house for a while then to my voice lesson.  After that was over and after we got totally drenched in the POURING rain... we got home and kat came and got us and we went to the mall for a while... After rushing like mad turkeys.. yes thats right...... TURKEYS.... we finally got kat's bra from my house and stopped at McDonald's for something little to eat before Mo's Sweet 16..... Then we went to Nicole's house and waited for everyone to get there and then we all took a CRAZZZYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY limo ride to Buca di Beppo ((i think thats how its spelt lol im not sure)).... ate like pigs and went back in the CRAZZZYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY limo to nicole's house where we opened gifts and went to sleep. But right after colzie was done opening all her gifts anna read her a poem.. it was sooooo sweet and i we soo happy for nicole cause i could tell she looked so special... but as she was reading it i was like aww i wish someone could do that for me... cause that would have made everything so perfect... and i was sitting there thinking that when kat like came over and was like i di something like that for you..... and i was like..... hhhmmmm REALLLY??... hehe... and she's like yea i was gunna read it to everyone but i chickened out.... and p.s kat i hate you so much cause i wold have wnated you to do it.. .but lol its oik.. i love you anyways... so yea she took me out to her car and found it laying in the trunk and read it to me and i cried :(:(.. I LOVER YOU SOOO MUCH!!... hehe ur the best friend anyone could ever ask for and i love you with all my heart...even though i just said that....i cant even say it enough. :-D... so anyshways..   I had soo much fun that night... and im so glad that you had so much fun colzie.. i love you sooo much.... we are always gunna have our parties together haha.. or at least like close to eachother... I FUCKING LOVE MY MO!!!....

Today we all woke up and went to Panera Bread for breakfast.  Then ana and heather left cause ana had to get home.  Then whoeever was left which was me, nicole, anna, jenna, kat, and steph all went back to nicole's house to chizzile for a while.  Then i had to go to work so Kat, Steph and i went to my house where we saw the HOOOTTTIIIEEE real estate agent.... SO FUCKING HOTT.. i told you guyS!! hehe... then after living in kats car for like the whole weekend.... kat dropped me at work and they all went to the movies and saw the awsome movie Mr. and Mrs. Smith w\o me :( but thats ok.. i hope yall had fuuun... i love you gurls soo much.. i have so much fun when im with all of you!! :).... so anyways.. back on topic :) uumm i went home after work and then christi came and picked me up and we went to checkers, uumm jamba juice, barnes and nobles, and blockbuster.  And after about 3 hours of throwing grapes back and forth accross the windsheild she dropped me home and i took another shower and here i am sitting here at 12:30 at night typing on this fucking addicitng live journal!!.. jeeezzz... so technically its Monday but sshhhh no-one has to know that :P... so yea...

THANK YOU SOOO MUCH TO EVERYONE WHO CAME TO MY SWEET 16.... YOU REALLY REALLY SUPRISED ME AND YOU MADE IT THE BEST NIGHT I COULD HAVE EVER ASKED FOR.... I LOVE YOU ALL AND I HOPE EVERYONE HAS AN AMAZING (( and safe )) SUMMER!!!!!!!!

k im done boring you now... i lover everyone

<3<3<3<3<3 ME!!!<3<3<3<3<3

2. Add all of the numbers together to create a kind of super number.
                                                                                                  111

3. Make a note of the first digit of this number, then add the digits of the number together.
                                                                                                   3

4. Find the post of this number in your LJ. If you don't have that many posts, add the digits together again. Keep doing so until the number is smaller than your pathetic number of posts.
                                                                                      March 2, 2004

5. Take the digit you noted in step 3, and count that many words into the post and bold them.
                                                                                           "Hey"

6. Use the resulting word in a Google Image Search, and select a picture from the first page.

so today started out uneventful.. then i got a call from my dear pal christi!!  she picked me up and then we went to wal mart to pic up my pictures that have been there forever... they were pretty damn funny!! then we went to her aunt liz's house for easter dinner.  We had lots of fun there.  we went to the neighbors house to play a little b-ball.  then at 4 it was time for din din... I didn't really like the meat selection :( but i had some anyways :)... and there was also potatos (gotta love the potatos (its the irish in me lol christi)) and there was spinich ( i have no clue how to spell that haha), squash, sweet potatoes.. and thats pretty much it... then wen we were all full we called sofa and made plans with her...

We left Liz's house and went to go pick up sophie at her house.  We got there, blasted some little mermaid shit... (btw it was pretty damn cool) and then sat in the parking lot of the shopping plaza by her house for about 20 minutes trying to figure out something to do... It was then when i realized that i had to pee REALLY BADLY!!!.... so we finally decided that we were going to go get gas and then go to the carnival in the mission bay parking lot in Boca.  so we get to the gas station to discover that there are no bathrooms, or at least that's what sophie told me... so then i really really really have to pee now... and im like about to expload..so there's an albertson's in the shopping plaza where the carnival was.. so christi dropped me off and went to park... i got into albertsons thinking that the bathroom was up in the front of the store, but later discovered that it was all the way in the back.... LUCKY FREKIN ME!!... so i like ran back there (im not effing exageratting on this one.. nor am i lying) i almost didn't make it.. thats how bad i had to go!... so then i met up with them at their parking spot and we went into the carnival thingy.... I ROAD THE "CARIS WHEEL" FOR THE FIRST TIME IN MY LIFE!! i was soooo scared!! but i did it and im proud of myself... we went on alot of rides and it was fun... the second time we went on the feris wheel.... there was this guy that was running the thing and when you get in your supposed to push the doors to get in only it dosn't say that on the outside so you wouldn't know unless like you knew.. you know what im saying? anyways... christi like climbed over the doors and the guy was like "so you know how to read yet?" and christi gave him back this little look.. aahh it was hilarious... guess you had to be there.. anyways... uumm yea when we were getting over christi tripped on like a wire or something and he was like: "Walk much?" and like as we were walking away we were like eeww ass hole!.. haha anyways so yea that was our fun fillled nite!...then we went to taco "HELL" and got some foooooood.. dropped sofa off at school... (don't ask) and then christi dropped me home... and now its late and i wanna go to sleep.... soooo... GOOD NITE YALL!!!

xo0oxo00xoxox00xox0xox0ox0xoox0xx0o

so much to tell so little time...to sum it all up i saw everything... except the empire state!... only cause i saw that last time i went to NY... i even saw some of my parents childhood friends... and the uncle that i have never met before... it was fun!!... if you wold like to know more you can IM me... if not then... well... DON'T! heehhee

xo0ox
Nicole

P.S -- i missed everyone except katryna cause apparently she misses Paris more than me!!! :( that hurts dude.. it hurts...

(that was a joke btw... i missed everyone!!.. and when i say everyone i mean EVERYONE!)

oh... p.s. -- Gwen Stefani is my new favorite person... I LOVE HER SONGS lol.. i learned this when i was with katelyn and melanie and we listened to all her songs... i love it haha xo0xo

Friday: Went to school did the interim.. the norm lol... Anna and Colzie came home with me and we got ready to go to the movies... It was originally supposed to be me anna nicole and tim but it wound up being alot more!!... the people that were there were: Jenn, Nicole, Me, Katryna, Anna, Carey, Tim, Alex, and Kramer.. lol it was lots of fun! i like having alot of people... before the movie i saw sam, carolyn, amanda, and andrew. IT was cooooool lol... the movie was HORRIBLE!! THE WORST ACTING I HAVE EVER SEEN!!!.. but thats ok cause there were select people (not saying names) that kept me awake and entertained hehe ILU!!... so Colzie came home with me and slept over.. when we got home from the movies the rents werent' home so we decided to have a little party lol jk.. but AJ came over in his FINE ASS CAR!!.... so hott lol... the pimp mobile!!... and we walked around the park in my neighborhood for a while... then nicole and i went back inside and went to sleep pretty much... oh only after we tryed trapping a killing this enourmus beetle that was in my room... scariest experience OF MY LIFE!!! THEN we went to bed lol..

Saturday: got up.. Nicole came with me to my voice lesson and then we went back home and nicole's mom came a picked us up for a little shopping... we went to bed bath and beyond and then to the pizza place where the service was weird lol.. then we went to the mall where i was the tour guide cause they live in boca and dont' go to the coral square mall.... so if it wasn't for me they would have gotten lost hehe... but it was looooots of fun... then colzie dropped me off at my house and i took a little nap..... I woke up and i saw that i had like 4 missed calls and 3 text messages... it figures that on the one night i already have plans i get all these calls and messages asking me to hang out.. aahh i hate it lol... but yea so hunter came and picked me up and we went to the movies with john polacheck, sofa, melanie and katelyn.  We saw ROBOTS!!... funniest movie of my life!! so hilarious! lol the movie got out and I went home with katelyn and melanie to mel's house where i spent the night... We got to her house and watched the end of 50 first dates with her family that was asleep haha... and then went up to her room to go night night but did everythying but that!!... I had the time of my life!! we were up all night dancing and taking silly pictures.. and to think that i thought katelyn was going to let me sleep... GOSH lol... so we took picutres all night until katelyn had this brillient idea to put like rediculous makeup on and dance around like we were b4... haha so we did and it was amazing... ill post those pictures later when she sendsthem to me!!..... so much fun..

Sunday: Got up at like 10 and went to brunch with Melanie, Katelyn and mel's family and neighbors.... i honsetly dont't hink i have ever eaten so much in my ENTIRE life.. it was amazing.. it was FOOD GALORE!.. haha... so yea we did that and then after that we went to go see ROBOTS again!!... lol... thats how freking good it was...so then we went back to mel's house,, did some scrapbooking, watched a little aladdin with her sisters, played with her sister's fake food.... all that jazz and then hunter came over and we ate dinner and hunter took me home.... it was soooo fun.!!

Monday: didn't feel like going to school cause we weren't going on any feildtrips or anything and we would just be taking pictures all day and i needed to sleep so my parents let me stay home... slept till about 12 when my mom came and got me, took me with her to her dr. appt. and then took me back to her office where i am now sitting and typing this lol... im actually not having a very bad time... not very fun.. lol.. but not horribly boring...

so yea im giong to NY next week for SPRING BREAK!! aaahhh im soooo frekin pumped and excited!!... i can't wait... i just made an appt. for my dad and I to take a tour and a sit down like Q&A session with one of the administrators of NYU!.. im really excited for that!!! and my parents bought and appartment in midtown int he city so that should be amazing.. and we sare seeing like 5 shows and going to times square and macy's and out to long island and stuff... so excited..

well i have to go but ill post more later

<3 LUV YAS!!! <3 

xo0ox

~Nicole~

heyy everyone!... so the interim that i am in is really really funn!!... i didn't know if it would be reall really funn... but it is lol.. and if your interested in seeing some pictures... lol i want to post some but i dont' know how... would anyone like to show me or explain it to me? if so please let me know asap so i can show you guys my beautiful pictures lol jk.. but i wanna c what you guys think.. so if anyone knows how to do it let me know

2 MORE FUCKING DAYS!!! can't wait lol... no more stress of school for 3 whole weeks.. can anyone say.. HALLELUEAH!?!? (i spelt is rong but thats ok)

can't wait for this weekend... 2 jazz band performances.. even though i wont sing its ok cause i still enjoy being there... and im gunna get my nails and eyebrows done.. finally hehe.. just in case anyone cares lol... and im just gunna be chill.. take it easy... Sam might come over and we might go visit some people ;) but other than that.. pretty chill weekend.. and then its interims!.. so phsyced!! (spelled rong again.. lol)

gunna go do homework.. xo0ox

p.s. --> if anyone wants to give me advice on how to confront a person of the male gender (hehe).. please let me know in a comment or in person don't matter to me...

im out!
~B. (blondie.. my new signature... on LJ that is lol)

Friday: Went to school.. the norm lol. then came home sat around for a while, then christi and i went out and had SO MUCH FREKIN FUN!!!... i dont't hink ive ever had that much fun in my life... well maybe i have but idk lol... she picked me up at like 8.... 30!! lol. then we went to wal-mart -- got cameras.. took pictures with mr. bear then went to wendy's.  After that we went to the Walk on University but didn't realy do anything.. just park next to this creepy car that we thought was empty but turned out not to be... WEIRD... then she threw chicken at the car and then we drove away.  Then we met up with some people at don carters in boca where we parked next to a speed bump.. wait.. what speed bump?? lol.. then we were gunna go the movies with the people from don carters but i had to go home cause it was late so christi dropped me home and then went back to the movies with the people from don carters. lol.. then came saturday!

Saturday: Woke up, went to my voice lesson for an hour, got home went online... then got ready for the fine arts festival.  Christi came a picked me up and we went to publix to get subs for lunch.. wow!.. i dont' think i have ever acted so childish in my life!.. got in a huge race car and christi pushed me around and the cart wouldn't steer left.. so funny!.. then we took a picture with a huge toilet paper role and then left and waited for the shuttle at the rec center.  While waiting we ate our oil/mayo filled subs!! YUMMMMMMMMMMMM lol... the oil went all over christi!..  then we went to the festival and met up with sophie and mel and watched katelyn with the guitar class!.. fun fun fun!.. then came choir.. enough said.. then came jazz band... worst performace (for me) EVER!!!... don't wanna talk about it.. so that put me in a bad mood for about an hour!.. then sophie, christi, and i went to wings plus, then to the walk where we went to kilwins and barnes and noble... then my mom wanted me to come home and sleep cause i hadn't slept in a really long time so christi dropped me off and i went to sleep and then she dropped sophie off i guess lol.. don't really know what happened after that.. lol.. all i know is i got a good nights sleep..

Sunday: BORING!.. woke up, ate breakfast, tried to get my dad to take me somewhere but NOOOOOO so im sitting here bored outa my mind!.. lol.. i wanted to go get my nails done but theres nothing open today i dont' think... so i think i might go to the mall or movies later with some people but idk yet..

Hey everyone!.. havn't updated in a while.. been really busy with school and such..
So this weekend was really funn!... on Thursday was Justin's 16th birthday party.  We all took 4 hummer/excursion limos from school to South Beach, Miami and got off at Pearl (it was amazing).  We got there and ate dinner.  It was expensive and i felt special eating there.  So we all ate and socialized and we were supposed to watch a fashion show but.. we didn't lol... instead we went downstairs to the club.  AMAZING!!.. there were beds and pillows and such.  We danced ALL NIGHT... so much fun... then things got a little crazy and im not going to say anymore ;)
That night Katryna, Anna and I went back to Kat's house and pretty much just went to sleep--> After eating some easy mac and ice cream cake from carvel (crunchies yummm) of course!
Friday we all woke up and just chylled.  Her parents were at work so we pretty much just stayed in the house and had.... well... "fun"... hehe.. enough said... we watched "Shall we Dance" and then ate some food and then went on the computer and then ate some more food and did something else and then ate some MORE FOOD!... point being is that we are PIGS!! :P... We got the idea that we wanted to go watch a movie but we couldn't decide what movie we wanted to watch.  So we decided to watch 2 movies.  We watched Hide and Seek with kat's mom (SCARRY!!).. then we watched Coach Carter with just the three of us (INSPIRATIONAL!!!) lol... so we all went our seperate ways after that.  
On Saturday i pretty much did nothing... I got some homework done but thats pretty much it.  Saturday night i went to the movies with Marissa, Bobby, a couple of Bobby's friends and we all had a great time!.. we saw Boogyman... SO EFFING SCARRY!!... i honestly can't even believe that i went into that movie.. i HATE scarry movies!...but it was fun.. so i went home and just went to bed i was tired from the whole weekend and needed the sleep.  
This morning i woke up.. did some homework, then went to WALMART! with my sister so she could get some valentines cards for her class!... as she was shopping for them i started to remember all of my memories of Grade School and having like halloween, valentines day, christmas, ect.  parties... i miss it so much and i wish that i could go back and do it again! :P... but anyway.. now im back here watch pimp my ride trying to avoid writng an 8 page English paper on the Louisiana Purchase... im really bored and wanna go do something but I really have to get this paper done... DAMN!.. I FUCKIN HATE SCHOOL GEEZ!... so i guess that was a pretty good start to my updating again... lol... comment if you wish!!
x00x
Nicole
